member.name: N:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI
member.summary: Provides interfaces that enable the Data Connection dialog box to interact with connection properties for a specified data provider, allowing users to input and edit connection property values.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties
member.summary: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable the Data Connection dialog box to interact with a specified data provider's connection properties.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Event that is raised when a data provider connection property is changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a custom property to the existing set of data connection properties recognized by the data provider.
member.param: Name of the custom property added to the existing set of connection properties.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether a given set of connection properties contains a specified property.
member.returns: Returns true if the set of connection properties contains the specified property; otherwise returns false.
member.param: Name of the property whose presence is being tested.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a data connection string that is built from a set of properties into the corresponding set of connection properties.
member.param: The connection string that is being parsed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a custom property from a specified set of data connection properties.
member.param: Name of the custom property to be removed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Reset
member.summary: Resets all connection properties and restores the object to its initial state.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Reset(System.String)
member.summary: Resets a specified connection property to its initial value.
member.param: Name of the connection property being set to its default value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Test
member.summary: Tests whether the current set of connection properties can successfully open a connection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.ToDisplayString
member.summary: Retrieves a connection string for on-screen display reflecting the current set of connection properties, minus "sensitive" information that should not be displayed.
member.returns: Returns the set of connection properties that are suitable for display on-screen.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.ToFullString
member.summary: Retrieves the complete connection string representing the current set of connection properties.
member.returns: Returns the entire connection string, including secure or sensitive information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.IsComplete
member.summary: Retrieves a Boolean value indicating whether the current set of connection property values provides sufficient information to open a connection to the data source.
member.returns: Returns true if the connection properties are complete; otherwise returns false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.IsExtensible
member.summary: Retrieves a Boolean value indicating whether the specified set of connection properties is extensible; that is, whether it is possible to add and remove custom properties to the set of connection properties.
member.returns: Returns true if the connection properties are extensible; otherwise returns false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Represents a property instance of specified type and value.
member.returns: Returns a property object instance of the specified name.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionUIControl
member.summary: Provides a set of methods and properties through which the Data Connection dialog box interacts with a third-party data connection user interface (UI) control, which is shown as the body of the Data Connection dialog box.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionUIControl.Initialize(Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionProperties)
member.summary: Initializes the data connection user interface (UI) control with an instance of the interface, which serves as the store for the data shown on the data connection UI control.
member.param: The set of connection properties serving as stores for data shown on the data connection UI control.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Data.ConnectionUI.IDataConnectionUIControl.LoadProperties
member.summary: Loads connection property values into the data connection UI controls from an instance of the interface.
